But if you feel like posting such outbursts like a bipolar maniac, feel free too.

rudaguygayonmeatspen[/quote]

item.title: Homos
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Kane., post:24, topic:248586”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=327700.msg2565811#msg2565811 date=1228388104]

I’m not sure, but I’m not 13 - I don’t have a lack of friends, and it seems one Elton John wannabe is taking this lolthread abit too serious, Kane.

I dun like Homos, I’m homophobic - Don’t blame me for not liking you face-in-pillow types.

You can attempt to insult me all you like, I’m still getting more than you.

P.S - I know you’re getting more cock than me, but you don’t have to keep saying it@@

My reference to stereotypes was quoted unto Yz, dear Cowie.

I’m taking this serious? I am totally jerking over this shit, man.

Come visit me sometime, Cowie. I’ll show you how versatile I am. ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2008, 04:53:59 am[/size][hr][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=327700.msg2565806#msg2565806 date=1228387970]

also, don’t judge us all on cowie`'s comments, I personally have nothing against homosexuals

I don’t like how they all act like girls, though.

Just a bit stereotypical of yourself, is it not? It’s okay, I don’t like how all 13 year olds on the internet act tough when in reality, they use the internet as a substitute for lack of friends.

Because of course, stereotypes are always correct, right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2008, 04:49:48 am[/size][hr][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=327700.msg2565799#msg2565799 date=1228387579]
I’m not a coward, I’d just rather do the natural girl thing rather THAN GET A BIG FAT COCK UP MY ASS.

You can attempt to insult me all you like, I’m still getting more than you.

Well, they do act like girls. If you’ve ever watched America’s Next Top Model, that fuckwit with the grey hair is seriously more of a pillow-biter than most homo’s. I don’t have a lack of friends, actually come to think of it I do. I have a little group of mates, but I’m not fussed, we all enjoy riding, so why would that have anything to do with you?
[/quote]
I enjoy riding, too- We have something in common, baby.
[/quote]
Oh, haha. Walked into that.
[/quote]
Quite intentional, my dear heterosexual friend.

I still want to know how gay sex works, do you both give and take, like have turns or one or the other???

Well, some people just like doing one thing. Others are fine with both, and may switch.
Both feel good, I don’t mind.[/quote]
Serious question, have you actually taken it from another man, and more importantly, how did that ‘situation’ occur? If you don’t want to answer such a question, I don’t blame you.

Read full topic
